body: I was thinking of donating when a question came to my mind, what does the server do with all its donations?
body_tagged: I was thinking of donating when a question came to my mind, what does the server do with all its donations?
title: A weird question for mods

replies.body:
The donations that are made currently keep the server up and running. 
They go towards development, domains and mainly server costs...
replies.body_tagged:
The donations that are made currently keep the server up and running. 
They go towards development, domains and mainly server costs...

replies.body: server costs?? like what :O and what developments?
